title: NVIDIA GeForce NOW for Chrome OS hands-on [Video]
content:
After initially launching on Chrome OS courtesy of a web app, you’re now able to download GeForce NOW with a dedicated app available from the Google Play Store.

more…

The post NVIDIA GeForce NOW for Chrome OS hands-on [Video] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Already on Chrome OS via a web app, you're now able to download GeForce NOW with a dedicated app available from the Google Play Store.
